General.Name: Lead Real Estate Co., Ltd American Depositary Shares
General.Description: Lead Real Estate Co., Ltd together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells luxury residential properties in Japan. The company develops single-family homes and condominiums. It also operates hotels in Tokyo and leases apartment building units in Japan and Dallas, Texas. Lead Real Estate Co., Ltd was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
General.Address: MFPR Shibuya Nanpeidai Building, Tokyo, Japan, 150-0036
